General.Name: Dr Sulaiman Al Habib Medical Group
General.Description: Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Medical Services Group Company establishes, manages, and operates hospitals, general and specialized medical complexes, day surgery centers, and pharmaceutical facilities in Saudi Arabia and internationally. It operates maternity, and orthopedics and spinal surgeries hospitals. The company also operates dermatology, plastic surgery, ophthalmology, obesity treatment, and fertility centers, as well as pharmacies. In addition, it provides home health care, specialized medical laboratories, technology, information systems, facility maintenance, medical equipment maintenance, and telemedicine services, as well as involved in real estate activities. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Fahad Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11372
